subtitle.translate: Crafting is half of the game, why is so boring? We can fix that!

description: - Open your inventory and take a look at the big list of items on the right side of your screen! You can scroll through with the scroll wheel, or use the Search bar at the bottom of your screen.
- You can press &&7[&&r&&6R&&r&&7]&&r to see the &&5Recipe&&r for an item, or &&7[&&r&&6U&&r&&7]&&r to see the &&5Uses&&r for that item.
- Press &&7[&&r&&6A&&r&&7]&&r on an item to add it to your handy to-do list on the left side of your screen.
- If the interface is distracting, you can press &&7[&&r&&6CTRL+O&&r&&7]&&r to hide it.
&&7[ItemFavorites]&&r &&7[&&r&&6ALT&&r&&7]&&r+&&6Click&&r items in your inventory to prevent storing, sorting, and dropping.
&&7[QuickStack]&&r Press the &&3Chest&&r button in the inventory to &&dstore items already present in nearby chests&&r.
&&7[InventorySorter]&&r &&6Middle Click&&r in any inventory to &&dsort items&&r.
&&7[MouseTweaks/Inventory Essentials]&&r Many new ways to move items.
- Try clicking and dragging item stacks to spread them across multiple slots!
- Holding &&7[&&r&&6CTRL&&r&&7]&&r and left-clicking will move single items.
- Hold &&7[&&r&&6Space&&r&&7]&&r while clicking an inventory to &&drestock from it&&r, or while clicking your inventory to &&dquick store to it&&r.
- Try using the mouse wheel to precisely move items between inventories!
&&7[Crafting Tweaks]&&r You'll see 3 new buttons in all crafting benches - you can use these to quickly balance stacks, clear the grid, and more.
&&7[Clean Tooltips/Enchantment Descriptions]&&r Tooltips contain &&ddetailed item information&&r, such as item contents, attributes, and effects.
